Plot QuarterUnitPizza distribution kernel

```{r}

data <- pi/4

ggplot(data, aes(x = x)) +
  geom_density(fill = "blue", alpha = 0.5) +
  labs(title = "Kernel Density Plot", x = "Value", y = "Density")



```
